title: Can we look at Mordekaiser in nexus blitz
body:
He is just a troll in nexus blitz
Poke and cc dominates in this mode

replies.body: Can we look at the 250+ Mordekaiser bugs first
From a Morde main who has been playing the hell out of Nexus Blitz. I have to ask for you to kindly keep your opinion to your self.

wait for his vgu in 2025
https://i.imgur.com/Tg0L1ok.png[]

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nsvEFAPl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-24T04:51:51.097+0000)
>
> wait for his vgu in 2025
> https://i.imgur.com/Tg0L1ok.png[]

Assuming Riot knows how to touch old stuff like TT.

But they will eventually...

Kappa

Yeah... _Mordekaiser_. Not:

Jax
Lux
Ziggs
Zyra
Neeko
Pyke
Xin
Yi
Brand
Fiddlesticks
Pyke
...
**Pyke**

_Mordekaiser_ definitely is a huge problem here. Granted I've seen him maybe 10 times so far, I was playing him 3 of those.
